task.prompt: Christine and Rachel went strawberry picking.  They want to make pies and need 3 pounds of strawberries per pie.  Christine picked 10 pounds of strawberries and Rachel picked twice as much as Rachel.  Together, how many pies can they make?

steps.c: Plan: identify requirements from task. Task: Christine and Rachel went strawberry picking.  They want to make pies and need 3 pounds of strawberries per pie.  Christine picked 10 pounds of strawberries and Rachel picked twice as much as Rachel.  Together, how many pies can they make?
Work through the math carefully and keep intermediate values.
